name: Catsle
description:
It's just all about some little cute cats, twins and puzzles! ................... I guess...

Hi! This is my first RPGMaker game (but it's just a demo version and still in development.) Estimated playtime is about 15-30 minutes if you play all mini-games.

Instructions:

  • F4 = Windowed / Fullscreen
  • F5 = Restart
  • Z = Interact
  • X = Menu / Cancel
  • Arrows = Move

I created this game originally in Thai, then translated into English all by myself, so...

Please keep in mind that I'm not a native speaker of English. Some sentences or dialogues in this game (or even what you're reading right now) might sound unnatural. I would like to apologize for any errors.

However, I'm still improving my English. I would appreciate any comments and suggestions. (including any comments about the game <3)

If you see any bug in the game, you can report them in the comment section below.

Please enjoy! X3

Rabbit in Lantern
